title: Font from image
content:
Hi. I found an image that show the font (as image on attachment)  
If that is a font, could you tell me what the name of font and where I can find it. thanks a lot  
 [http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PF\_d1TIsJfw/UK8t2r3KIII/AAAAAAAAC1I/nZzU2eWH8TM/s1600/iman.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803170226/http:/2.bp.blogspot.com/-PF_d1TIsJfw/UK8t2r3KIII/AAAAAAAAC1I/nZzU2eWH8TM/s1600/iman.jpg)
author: Bravoz

comments.content:
"General Discussions  
All topics are welcome—except font ID requests."

The Type ID board is [there](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803170226/http:/typophile.com/typeid), not here.
